tooltip.florafauna.dormant_symbiote: A mysterious alien lifeform, waiting to be awakened
tooltip.florafauna.symbiote_stew: A strange concoction that prepares you for symbiosis
gui.florafauna.tool_config.title: Tool Config
gui.florafauna.cocoon.title: Cocoon Chamber
command.florafauna.symbiote.player_only: This command can only be run by a player!
command.florafauna.symbiote.already_bond: You already have a bonded symbiote!
command.florafauna.symbiote.not_bonded: You don't have a bonded symbiote!
command.florafauna.symbiote.invalid_abil: Invalid ability: %s. Valid abilities: dash, featherFalling, speed
command.florafauna.ability.player_only: This command can only be run by a player!
command.florafauna.ability.no_item: You must be holding an item
symbiote.dialogue.bonded: I was hoping you'd hesitate. You did not. Now it's permanent.
symbiote.dialogue.unbonded: The bond is severed. I will… adjust my expectations.
symbiote.dialogue.cold_water: This environment is aggressively unwelcoming. You noticed, I assume.
symbiote.dialogue.drowning: You require oxygen. An old favorite.
symbiote.dialogue.sleeping: Rest. I'll remain here, doing nothing visibly productive.
symbiote.voice.environmental.cold_1: Your warmth is making a quiet exit.
symbiote.voice.environmental.cold_severe: Thermal stability has left the conversation.
symbiote.voice.environmental.drowning_1: Air is becoming a limited resource.
symbiote.voice.environmental.drowning_2: This strategy has a short timeline.
symbiote.voice.combat.severe_2: We should pretend this was intentional.
symbiote.voice.fall.moderate_2: Your structure held. Let’s not celebrate.
symbiote.voice.fall.severe_1: That was excessive by most standards.
symbiote.voice.fall.severe_2: I would prefer you remain in one piece.
symbiote.voice.bonding.established: The arrangement is active. I suggest we make it worthwhile.
symbiote.dream.reflective.general_1: Fragments surface. None seem eager to cooperate.
symbiote.dream.reflective.general_2: Something unresolved continues to avoid your attention.
symbiote.dream.reflective.stalled_1: Several processes remain incomplete. They are quietly undermining you.
symbiote.dream.directional.general_1: You are expanding impressively. Unfortunately, without cohesion.
symbiote.dream.directional.general_2: You are searching elsewhere for something already nearby.
symbiote.dream.anchored.general_1: Completion is approaching. You seem hesitant to meet it.
symbiote.dream.anchored.general_2: Wholeness is available. It requires effort.
symbiote.dream.anchored.integration_1: Integration is possible. The components are present. The connection is conspicuously absent.
symbiote.florafauna.use_cocoon: Use the Cocoon Chamber to bond with me...
symbiote.florafauna.not_bindable: You must consume Symbiote Stew first
symbiote.florafauna.no_dormant_symbiote: You need a Dormant Symbiote in your inventory
symbiote.florafauna.already_bonded: You already have a bonded symbiote
symbiote.florafauna.not_bonded: You don't have a bonded symbiote
symbiote.florafauna.bonded_success: The symbiote has bonded with you
symbiote.florafauna.cocoon_destroyed: Your cocoon spawn has been destroyed, restoring previous spawn
symbiote.florafauna.stew_consumed: You feel... different. The cocoon beckons.
symbiote.florafauna.already_prepared: You are already prepared for symbiosis
symbiote.florafauna.husk_not_owner: This husk does not recognize you.
